title: [Feat]: Improve Copy&Paste from Chats to Text Windows / Toggle compose.disableTimestampOnCopy (Copy with Names + Timestamps)
body:
### Describe the feature

Include Names and Time Stamps in Copy&Paste to Text

### Motivation

We often copy parts of chats to our issue tracker for documentation purpose.

* Ctrl+C in the Chat Window
* Ctrl+Shift+V in the issue tracker (to exclude formatting)

This worked great until half year ago or so and produced text output like this:

[12:10] Me: Which color should be the button?
[12:14] John Doe: Blue please

But nowadays it produces only


Which color should be the button?
Blue please

So it's heard to see who said what.

I would be nice to include this user info and timestamp.

### Alternatives

Adding those infos tediously manually.
